mapper.sql: orders, id, role_name as name, role_type, data_scope, remarks, parent as pid, treepath, grade, modifer, modify_date, platform_code
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", parent AS "pid", role_name AS "name", ( SELECT NVL2(sir.role_id,'true','false') FROM T_SYS_STAFF_INST_ROLE sir WHERE sir.ROLE_ID = a.ID AND sir.institution_id = #{instId} AND sir.staff_id = #{staffId} and rownum = 1 ) AS checked FROM T_SYS_ROLE a WHERE a.platform_code = #{platformCode} ORDER BY orders ASC
